title: ‘Love Is Blind’ Finale Breakdown
description:
Amelia Wedemeyer is joined by Bill Simmons, Juliet Litman, and Kevin O’Connor for a breakdown bonanza of the ‘Love Is Blind’ Season 2 finale. They discuss the fates of each of our couples, debate the biggest red flag of the season, and make their picks for which city the show should feature next. 
Hosts: Amelia Wedemeyer, Juliet Litman, Kevin O’Connor and Bill Simmons
Producers: Devon Manze and Chelsea Stark-Jones
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
